reviews.text: Feel like I hit the jackpot with this hotel! Staff is friendly, rooms are comfortable and clean. Walking distance to the train station and many lovely shops and restaurants. Definitely will stay here again!

It has the WOW factor! Staff were lovely and helpful especially explaining Public transport.  Easy to get to from the airport. Easy to travel to and from the main areas.

We were a little disappointed with the house  keeping. Maybe an off day!

We had a wonderful stay at The Manor hotel Amsterdam. The hotel was perfect, 100% clean, massive beds which were so comfy. Our bathrooms were huge with a power shower, spotless!! We had adjoining rooms both with big balconies which we used early morning/late evening. There were many bars/restaurants a few minutes walk from the hotel and a lovely shopping mall where we had an amazing breakfast sitting outside next to the river/canal. The staff at the hotel were so helpful, especially Remi the supervisor, nothing was to much trouble for him. We would definitely stay here again!!

Got a nice and spacious room on the mezzanine Level of the 2nd floor. Huge and comfy bed with semi firm mattress and obviously good pillow/blanket/bed linen hygiene. Had a soothing sleep coming back from an event. Bathroom with tub and they also provide showergel/shampoo. A good hairdryer is offered as well. What I found nice that in addition to a working air conditon one can tilt the window to let in fresh air from the garden/courtyard side. Personnel was friendly and accommodating. There is room for improvement in the hallways and some area with detail cleanliness. The carpet looks pretty worn and could use a proper refurbish or at least a more frequent vaccuming imho. Would probably book again.

A little disappointed to be honest. Didn't feel like a 4-star hotel.It's quite far from the main  attractions.There are no 3 pin UK power points in the rooms.We went to ask reception how to charge our phones,they had a box full of adaptors(very convenient for the large number of UK visitors??),selling them for 15€ each!!The decor apart from the reception area is quite frankly-weird. The room service menu is very limited, especially if you're vegetarian.At any hotel we stay at breakfast is a must but here the prices are extortionate hence,we gave it a miss.Won't be visiting again.
